entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Shoal Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shoal Lake 11:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023
Temperature: -7.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -10.3°C
Wind: E 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 5.
